title: E-commerce Website
description: A full-featured e-commerce website built with React and Node.js, featuring user authentication, product listings, shopping cart, and payment integration.

title: QR Attendance System
description: A QR code-based attendance system built with php and python for api, allowing users to make attendance and out using QR codes.

title: Ticket Booking System
description: A ticket booking system for events and movies, developed using Django and PostgreSQL, with features like seat selection, booking history, and email notifications.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Static Designs
description: A collection of static web designs created using Figma, demonstrating various UI/UX concepts and design principles.
